response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. Given its exceptional quality and value, we believe it would be an excellent addition to your collection. Considering its market value and the benefits it offers, we are offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $950,000. This offer is exclusive to you and reflects our commitment to providing top-tier solutions at competitive rates. We trust that you will find this proposal favorable and look forward to discussing the details further with you.", "product_price": 950000}
